bomberman.engine

Class Bomberman

  • java.lang.Object
    • bomberman.engine.Bomberman
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PinkBomberman

    public class Bomberman
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for creating and handling all the bomberman elements and events.
    Author:
    Rui Figueira - ei11021, Pedro Faria - ei11167

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bomberman(float initialX, float initialY, int lives, int bombRange, float speed, Level level)
      Constructor of this class.Function responsible for creating the bomberman.It initializes the bomberman animations,is current position his number of lives,number of bombs and speed.

      Function responsible for getting the bombPowerUp
      boolean checkCollisionsSide(float x, float y, Level level)
      Checks for collisions left and right.It checks for half of the bomberman sprite height if that sprite intersects a blocked element of the level.

      Checks for collisions up and down.It checks for the bomberman sprite width if any pixel intersects a blocked element of the level.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bomberman

        public Bomberman(float initialX,
         float initialY,
         int lives,
         int bombRange,
         float speed,
         Level level)
          throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Constructor of this class.Function responsible for creating the bomberman.It initializes the bomberman animations,is current position his number of lives,number of bombs and speed.
        Parameters:
        initialX - X of the initial position of the bomberman
        initialY - Y of the initial position of the bomberman
        lives - Number of initial lives of the bomberman
        bombRange - Range of the bombs of the bomberman
        speed - Speed of the bomberman movement
        level - Level where the bomberman is to be created
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
        int delta,
        Level level)
          throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Function responsible for the movement of the bomberman.
        Parameters:
        gc - GameContainer where the game is being displayed
        delta - Number of milliseconds between frames
        level - Level where the bomberman is to be moved
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • checkCollisionsSide

        public boolean checkCollisionsSide(float x,
                          float y,
                          Level level)
        Checks for collisions left and right.It checks for half of the bomberman sprite height if that sprite intersects a blocked element of the level.
        Parameters:
        x - X of the position of the bomberman
        y - Y of the position of the bomberman
        level - Level where the bomberman is
        Returns:
        true if it is possible to move or false if it isn't

      • checkCollisionsUpDown

        public boolean checkCollisionsUpDown(float x,
                            float y,
                            Level level)
        Checks for collisions up and down.It checks for the bomberman sprite width if any pixel intersects a blocked element of the level.
        Parameters:
        x - X of the position of the bomberman
        y - Y of the position of the bomberman
        level - Level where the bomberman is
        Returns:
        true if it is possible to move or false if it isn't

      • isBlocked

        public boolean isBlocked(float x,
                float y,
                Level level)
        Function responsible for checking the value of the pixel of the level on the collisions matrix.
        Parameters:
        x - X of the pixel to be checked
        y - Y of the pixel to be checked
        level - Level where the pixel is
        Returns:
        The value of the collision matrix.True if it is to be collided or false otherwise
